post.text:
Donald Trump agreed to release his tax returns if he ran for office.

Now? "It's none of your business." What's he hiding?

comment.author: Filipp
comment.text: Hey Hillary: On the art you're behind; Did you know this is an old communist tactic: It is; 1963 Communist Goals for America # 23. Control art critics and directors of art museums. "Our plan is to promote ugliness, repulsive, meaningless art." [NEA] The communists may not be smart but they are terrible people with a very, very simple playbook of propaganda. Yeah, we really want to be lead by the kind of morons that would do something like this: Hey, they're in the Bible; remember the Pharisees? And, remember Queen Jezebel? We do.
